Posts.Content: Oct 27, 2007 01:48PM sandies2 wrote: I tend to lean on the pro-active side of medicine. When medical professionals ask me to wait 6 months "to see" I interpret that as them using me as a human petri dish. I have a 9mm & 1mm nodule in my left breast in which doctors deem as "appears" to be a lymph node & this is after two mammo's & ultrasound. They are wanting me to wait 6 months "to see" and be retested. I have found another doctor and insisting to be retested. I want to know for sure. I would go in for a biopsy.I am pushing for a biopsy myself.
Posts.Title: Repeat Mammograms/Ultrasounds lindap sandies2
